title: Chris Stefanick Relativism Audio CD
description:
Title: Relativism

Subtitle: Do you know how it is affecting you?

Physical Media: Audio CD

Digital File Type: CDR Disk Image

Duration: 1 hour, 5 minutes, 20 seconds

Publisher: Lighthouse Catholic Media (http://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/)

Artists: Chris Stefanick, speaker (http://reallifecatholic.com/)

Description: Pope Benedict XVI considers Relativism to be the most dangerous dictatorship existing in the world today. In this presentation, Chris Stefanick debunks the powerful and epidemic myth of relativism with honesty, relevance, humor, and logical validity, offering a much-needed perspective on the current status quo of morality.


"If you only listen to one CD this year, listen to Relativism by Chris Stefanick." -- Matthew Kelly

---

My Comments:

I highly recommend this audio CD, and I hope you find Chris Stefanick's speech to be enlightening and refreshing. As a courtesy, I have uploaded an MP3 version of this CD to my web site at the following location. Feel free to listen to it online here instead:
